availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky distiller. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Porter Burnes on July 1, 1854 in Harrison County, Kentucky. Father of Sarah C. Burnes, Elizabeth I. Burnes, Franklin T. Burnes, and George E. Burnes. Distiller in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 469.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Casons Precinct, p. 116B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216888, p. 500.
